title: Bug Splat doesn't allow Match to Launch
body: I get into the game, pick champs then when match goes to launch I'm Bug Splatted. I've updated vid card, direct x 12, did a clean boot, not sure whats going on. I've never been bug splatted like this.

replies.body: Bugsplatting at launch may indicate a driver or game file problem that's failing to render properly.  I know that you've done some troubleshooting steps already, but I also recommend going over each list in our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to get this resolved.  The guide will help cover the most common issues, and you can also use our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to help with some of the steps as well.  Let me know if you have any questions.
